LanguageData.SA.NaturalSentientChanceUponTamingOrAfte: Natural sentient chance upon taming or birth:
LanguageData.SA.alwaysStartWithSentientAnimals: Always start new games with sentient animals
LanguageData.SA.disableFilthGenerationForSentient: Disable filth generation for sentient animals
LanguageData.SA.enableCleaningJobForSentient: Enable cleaning job for sentient animals
LanguageData.SA.enableNursingJobForSentient: Enable nursing job for sentient animals
LanguageData.SA.inheritSentientFromParent: Inherit sentient from parent upon birth
LanguageData.SA.OnlySentientAnimalsGetsWeapons: Only sentient animals can wield weapons
LanguageData.SA.OnlySentientAnimalsGetsWeapons.Toolti: The Animal Weapon-mod makes all animals able to carry weapons. This option disables that for all animals that are not sentient. If game is running, reload save needed to have effect.
LanguageData.SA.resetall.confirm: Resetting all animals to the base-value
